name: Terminator 3: War of the Machines
description:
Terminator 3: War of the Machines is an action-shooter game developed by Clever's Software Development. It was originally released in 2003. Atari published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Terminator 3: War of the Machines has a score of 25. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Terminator 3: War of the Machines on PC.
